MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 and CW6 postcode areas of Malpas and Tarporley. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:41AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a grounded overhead line affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:46 AM on Saturday, 20 February 2021
